title: On CCTV, Terrorists Seen With Rifles Carrying Out Deadly Turkey Attack
content: Five people were killed and 22 others injured in an attack on the headquarters of a top Turkish defence firm near Ankara.
summary: Five people were killed and 22 others injured in an attack on the headquarters of a top Turkish defence firm near Ankara.

title: US Teen Fell In Love With "Game Of Thrones" Chatbot, Killed Self: Mother
content: 14-year-old Sewell Setzer III, a Florida boy, would chat with his online friend, Daenerys Targaryen, a lifelike AI chatbot named after a character from Game of Thrones.
summary: 14-year-old Sewell Setzer III, a Florida boy, would chat with his online friend, Daenerys Targaryen, a lifelike AI chatbot named after a character from Game of Thrones.

title: Watch: Barack Obama Raps Eminem's 'Lose Yourself' At Detroit Rally
content: Rap icon Eminem and former US President Barack Obama shared a light-hearted moment at a rally for the Kamala Harris-Tim Walz campaign ahead of the presidential elections at later's hometown Detroit.
summary: Rap icon Eminem and former US President Barack Obama shared a light-hearted moment at a rally for the Kamala Harris-Tim Walz campaign ahead of the presidential elections at later's hometown Detroit.

title: Al Jazeera Responds After Israel's Big Claim On 6 Gaza-Based Journalists
content: Israeli forces have branded six Gaza-based journalists of Al Jazeera as "terrorists", accusing them of being part of the Palestinian Hamas and Islamic Jihad groups.
summary: Israeli forces have branded six Gaza-based journalists of Al Jazeera as "terrorists", accusing them of being part of the Palestinian Hamas and Islamic Jihad groups.

title: Elon Musk Angers Eminem Fans With "Diddy" Remark After Obama Rally
content: Sean "Diddy" Combs was indicted last month on three criminal counts that alleged he sexually abused women and coerced them into drug-fueled sex parties.
summary: Sean "Diddy" Combs was indicted last month on three criminal counts that alleged he sexually abused women and coerced them into drug-fueled sex parties.

title: Kamala Harris To Deliver Her Final Presidential Speech On October 29
content: Kamala Harris will make her "closing argument" on Tuesday against rival Donald Trump, a campaign official said, a key speech to be delivered at the Washington site where the ex-president rallied supporters before the January 6 riot.
summary: Kamala Harris will make her "closing argument" on Tuesday against rival Donald Trump, a campaign official said, a key speech to be delivered at the Washington site where the ex-president rallied supporters before the January 6 riot.

title: Amid BRICS Summit, Russian Foreign Ministry Hit By Massive Cyberattacks
content: The Russian Foreign Ministry was targeted by a severe cyber attack on Wednesday, coinciding with the major BRICS summit taking place in the country, spokeswoman Maria Zakharova said.
summary: The Russian Foreign Ministry was targeted by a severe cyber attack on Wednesday, coinciding with the major BRICS summit taking place in the country, spokeswoman Maria Zakharova said.

title: Meta To Face Lawsuits In Japan Over Fake Ads
content: Facebook and Instagram owner Meta Platforms Inc. will face fresh lawsuits in Japan over advertisements that fraudulently solicited investment funds with fake endorsements from celebrities, local media reported.
summary: Facebook and Instagram owner Meta Platforms Inc. will face fresh lawsuits in Japan over advertisements that fraudulently solicited investment funds with fake endorsements from celebrities, local media reported.

title: Hezbollah Targets Israeli Military Company In Tel Aviv As War Intensifies
content: Hezbollah has said it attacked the Israel Military Industries Ltd., also referred to as Ta'a, in the suburbs of Tel Aviv with missiles.
summary: Hezbollah has said it attacked the Israel Military Industries Ltd., also referred to as Ta'a, in the suburbs of Tel Aviv with missiles.

title: Canada To Cut Immigration Numbers
content: Canada will sharply lower the number of immigrants it allows into the country for the first time in years, in a dramatic policy change for an unpopular government trying to hang on to power.
summary: Canada will sharply lower the number of immigrants it allows into the country for the first time in years, in a dramatic policy change for an unpopular government trying to hang on to power.

title: "Unhinged, Unstable" Kamala Harris Blasts Trump Over Alleged Hitler Remark
content: Kamala Harris on Wednesday said Donald Trump was "increasingly unhinged," and called her US election rival's reported praise for Adolf Hitler "incredibly dangerous" as campaigning intensified ahead of the November 5 vote.
summary: Kamala Harris on Wednesday said Donald Trump was "increasingly unhinged," and called her US election rival's reported praise for Adolf Hitler "incredibly dangerous" as campaigning intensified ahead of the November 5 vote.

title: McDonald's Tries To Reassure Customers After Deadly E. Coli Outbreak
content: McDonald's worked Wednesday to reassure customers that its US restaurants are safe as federal investigators tried to pinpoint the cause of a deadly E coli outbreak linked to fast-food giant's Quarter Pounder hamburgers.
summary: McDonald's worked Wednesday to reassure customers that its US restaurants are safe as federal investigators tried to pinpoint the cause of a deadly E coli outbreak linked to fast-food giant's Quarter Pounder hamburgers.

title: US Says At Least 3,000 North Korea Troops Training In Russia
content: At least 3,000 North Korean soldiers have been sent to Russia and are training there, the United States said Wednesday, warning that they would become legitimate targets for Kyiv if they engage in combat in Ukraine.
summary: At least 3,000 North Korean soldiers have been sent to Russia and are training there, the United States said Wednesday, warning that they would become legitimate targets for Kyiv if they engage in combat in Ukraine.

title: PM Modi Arrives In Delhi After Attending BRICS Summit In Russia
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi returned to Delhi after his two-day visit to Russia, during which he participated in the 16th BRICS Summit in Kazan.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi returned to Delhi after his two-day visit to Russia, during which he participated in the 16th BRICS Summit in Kazan.

title: Video Explainer: Understanding The LAC And The Stand-Off With China
content: PM Narendra Modi and Chinese President Xi Jinping held their first "formal bilateral meeting" since the military stand-off between India and China began in 2020. Here is an explainer with video, a map, and satellite images to help understand the LAC.
summary: PM Narendra Modi and Chinese President Xi Jinping held their first "formal bilateral meeting" since the military stand-off between India and China began in 2020. Here is an explainer with video, a map, and satellite images to help understand the LAC.

title: UK's Birmingham Airport Evacuated Over "Suspicious Vehicle"
content: A major international airport serving the UK's second-largest city was evacuated and all flights were suspended for several hours on Wednesday because of a security alert.
summary: A major international airport serving the UK's second-largest city was evacuated and all flights were suspended for several hours on Wednesday because of a security alert.

title: 'Terror Consensus A Long-Pending Matter At UN': What PM Modi Said At BRICS
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi emphasised the need for unified action against terrorism at the 16th BRICS Summit. He stressed that combating terrorism requires "single-minded" focus and "firm-support" of all nations.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi emphasised the need for unified action against terrorism at the 16th BRICS Summit. He stressed that combating terrorism requires "single-minded" focus and "firm-support" of all nations.

title: Joe Biden Attacks Donald Trump, Says "Gotta Lock Him Up", Then Backtracks
content: Joe Biden was at a New Hampshire campaign on Tuesday when he started off by saying "We gotta lock him up," soon after he tweaked his statement to, "Politically lock him up". Backtracking further, he added, "Lock him out, thats what weve got to do."
summary: Joe Biden was at a New Hampshire campaign on Tuesday when he started off by saying "We gotta lock him up," soon after he tweaked his statement to, "Politically lock him up". Backtracking further, he added, "Lock him out, thats what weve got to do."

title: Eminem Endorses Kamala Harris, Joins Barack Obama To Garner Support For Her
content: Eminem, the renowned rapper originally from Detroit, on Tuesday endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris, making it a star-studded affair. He then welcomed former President Barack Obama on the stage.
summary: Eminem, the renowned rapper originally from Detroit, on Tuesday endorsed Vice President Kamala Harris, making it a star-studded affair. He then welcomed former President Barack Obama on the stage.

title: Kamala Harris To Face Voters' Queries In Must-Win Battleground Pennsylvania
content: Kamala Harris heads to must-win Pennsylvania on Wednesday to take voters' questions live while Donald Trump campaigns in Georgia -- another of the seven toss-up states expected to decide the result of an extremely close White House race.
summary: Kamala Harris heads to must-win Pennsylvania on Wednesday to take voters' questions live while Donald Trump campaigns in Georgia -- another of the seven toss-up states expected to decide the result of an extremely close White House race.
